Eligibility.EligibilityNotes: Eligibility for previous bankruptcy, subject to credit check.

FeatureDetails.FeatureDescription:
- Free day to day banking 
- Overdraft available 
- 365 Online, Phone and Mobile Banking

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes:
International payments charges do not apply if:
- The payment is in Euros
- The payment must be going to an EU/EEA country
- The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary is provided
- The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the beneficiary bank is provided
- The beneficiary's name and address is provided
- There is no specified value date
- The charges option SHARED must be selected

Bank of Ireland UK standard charges for international payments will apply if:
- The payment is a currency other than Euros, or in Euros but going outside of the EU/EEA
- The payment request is for the same day or next day
- The beneficiary IBAN or BIC is not supplied or these are incorrect

International payments charges do not apply if:

- The charges option SHARED must be selected

OverdraftPricing.InterestNotes: Switching customers can apply for a 3 month, 0% overdraft.

data.ProductDescription: The Clear Current Account has been developed to provide you with flexibility, service, reliability and the value you expect.  How you manage your day-to-day banking is clearly up to you.  You choose whatever option suits best and you aren't committed to one particular route.

Eligibility.Description: Graduated from full time 3rd level education within the last 3 years.
Eligibility.EligibilityNotes: Eligibility for previous bankruptcy, subject to credit check.

- The payment request is for the same day or next day
- The beneficiary IBAN or BIC is not supplied or these are incorrect

International payments charges do not apply if:
- The payment is in Euros
- The payment must be going to an EU/EEA country
- The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary is provided
- The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the beneficiary bank is provided
- The beneficiary's name and address is provided
- There is no specified value date
- The charges option SHARED must be selected

- The payment is a currency other than Euros, or in Euros but going outside of the EU/EEA
- The payment request is for the same day or next day
- The beneficiary IBAN or BIC is not supplied or these are incorrect

data.ProductDescription: Are you a Recent Graduate?  Get a graduate current account from us that offers the same good-value banking that you enjoyed as a student, as well as all the benefits of a normal current account that will take care of all your banking needs.

Eligibility.Description: A full time student (of any nationality).

data.ProductDescription: Our 3rd level student package is available to undergraduate and postgraduate students and is full of great products to help you get exactly what you want from life.  Whether it's instant access to cash at home or something bigger that you want, we could help you get it now. You can also access your cash when you're abroad.  Charges will apply if you use your card outside the UK.  Please see our Student charges explained brochure for more details.

Eligibility.Description: A person in second level education aged between 11 and 19 or a person in year 7 of primary level education planning to go to second level education.

Bank of Ireland UK standard charges for international payments will apply if:
- The payment is a currency other than Euros, or in Euros but going outside of the EU/EEA

data.ProductDescription: It's simple. Because in ten years time, we want you to still be one of our customers. The Bank of Ireland UK student account (11-19 years) is full of great features to help you get exactly what you want from your bank.

data.ProductDescription: Basic Cash Account is a straightforward easy to use account and is available to personal customers who are over 16 years of age.  You can arrange for your wages or benefits to be paid directly into your account.  You can also arrange to pay your regular bills by Direct Debit.  Operated by card only, Basic Cash Account is ideal if you are taking the 1st step into Banking or are only looking for a simple account.
